text: Jilani (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ): “E jenumanja ŵandu! Chisimu une ni Ntenga jwa Allah kukwenu ŵanaose, Ajula jwauli Wakwe uchimwene wa kumawunde ni petaka, pangali nnungu jwine (jwakuŵajilwa kun'galagatila) ikaŵeje Jwelepejo, akupelekaga umi ni chiwa, basi munkulupililani Allah ni Ntenga Jwakwe, Ntume jwangapakombola kulemba ni kuŵalanga, ajula jwaakunkulupilila Allah ni maloŵe Gakwe, ni munkuyani kuti n'jongoche.”
